metadata.name: My Adiyogi 1/1
metadata.description:
My Adiyogi - The VediCubist's rendition of the First Yogi.

1080 X 1080 pxls
MP4 Video
10 Secs
No Audio

 In the yogic culture, Shiva is not known as a god, but as the Adiyogi or the first yogi â€“ the originator of yoga. He was the one who first put this seed into the human mind. According to the yogic lore, over fifteen thousand years ago, Shiva attained to his full enlightenment and abandoned himself in an intense ecstatic dance upon the Himalayas. When his ecstasy allowed him some movement, he danced wildly. When it became beyond movement, he became utterly still.

People saw that he was experiencing something that nobody had known before, something that they were unable to fathom. 
 - Sadhguru
